stripped_text: Whenever you encounter a barrier, you may install this program from your heap. X credits: +X strength. Then, if this program can interface with the barrier you are encountering, break up to X subroutines.
text: Whenever you encounter a barrier, you may install this program from your heap. X[credit]: +X strength. Then, if this program can interface with the barrier you are encountering, break up to X subroutines.
title: Paperclip
